original_title: Ukrainian envoy boasts Kiev ‘knows how to kill Russians’ — RT Russia & Former Soviet Union
article_summary: Russia returns remains of 1,000 Ukrainian soldiers as per Istanbul agreements; exchange follows discussions on potential settlement of the Russia-Ukraine conflict between Putin, Trump, Zelensky, and Western leaders. Meanwhile, a European MP criticizes the International Criminal Court's arrest warrant against Putin, calling it counterproductive and undermining diplomatic efforts to settle the conflict.</s>
